classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on backend systems development and mentions generative AI as a component. However, it lacks specific details on core GenAI tasks like prompt engineering, RAG, or fine-tuning, and does not list any specific GenAI tools or frameworks. It leans more towards general software engineering with an AI component.
